# Books

### R Programming

-   [R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/){target="_blank"} - This is by far-and-away the best guide to the tidyverse. An absolute must have!

-   [Hands on Programming with R](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/){target="_blank"} - Good resource for base R

### Data Visualization

-   [ggplot2](https://ggplot2-book.org/){target="_blank"} - Great overview of ggplot2

-   [Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction](https://socviz.co/){target="_blank"} - Good resource for data visualization

### R Markdown

-   [R Markdown Cookbook](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/){target="_blank"} - Great guide to R Markdown

### General

-   [Big Book of R](https://www.bigbookofr.com/index.html){target="_blank"} - Repository of freely available R books. There's a lot of them!
